scripts.startBackWindows: cd %cd%/Backend && npm i -f && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev && npm run dev
scripts.startBack: cd ${PWD}/Backend && npm i -f && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev && npm run dev
scripts.startFrontWindows: cd %cd%/FrontEnd && npm i -f && npm run dev
scripts.startFront: cd ${PWD}/FrontEnd && npm i -f && npm run dev
